alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:55AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CENTRE AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile and create slippery conditions. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 451 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was over Bellefonte moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Bellefonte, Pleasant Gap, Lemont, Zion, Houserville, Centre Hall, Milesburg, Snow Shoe, Blanchard, Clarence, Julian, Black Moshannon State Park, Bald Eagle State Park, Howard, Unionville, and University Park Airport. This includes Interstate 99 near mile marker 67, and from mile markers 73 to 85. This includes the following highways... Route 220 from Skytop to west of Lamar on I-80. Alternate Route 220 near near Port Matilda. Route 322 near State College. State Road 26 from State College to I-80. State Road 45 near Old Fort. SAFETY INFO... Roads may become slippery and snow covered. Use extra caution if commuting through this area. &&
